# text

**Instance Property**

A string of plain text.

## Declaration

```swift
var text: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You cannot change the value of this property once drawing begins for a print job. The delegate method [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInteractionControllerDelegate/printInteractionControllerWillStartJob(_:)] is called immediately before the formatting is set for the job.

Assigning a value to this property replaces the value in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISimpleTextPrintFormatter/attributedText] property with the same string data, albeit without any inherent style attributes. Instead, the print formatter styles the new string using the text attribute properties of this class.

## Related Documentation

- **init(text:)**: Returns a simple-text print formatter initialized with plain text.

## Getting and setting the text

- **attributedText**: A string of attributed text.
